comments:
Exception when opening the Test Log View on an active execution history.

For example, when opening the Test Log View on an active execution history (e.g. execution harness still emitting verdict events) using the TPTP-4.2.0-200602262249 driver, the following exception is thrown:

This was fixed by changes to TestLogVerdictCollection in i2.
